block.p: ARMSTRONG HOLDINGS, Lancaster, Pa., named Michael D. Lockhart chairman and chief executive. Mr. Lockhart was most recently chairman and chief executive at General Signal.
BUDGET GROUP, Lisle, Ill., named William S. Johnson chief financial officer, succeeding Neal Cohen, who resigned. Mr. Johnson had been president at the fabrics and fiber division of BP Amoco.

PRIMEDIA DIGITAL VIDEO, New York, named Bruce Gamache president. He had been chief operating officer at Digital Entertainment Network.
